answerText: action[10] Action is the time integral of this quantity, which is commonly represented as kinetic energy minus potential energy.

question: Question: This quantity is the conjugate to the angle variable. For 10 points each: [10] William Rowan Hamilton developed a principle of least "this", which states that motion occurs along the path which minimizes this quantity.
